exceptions.exn: The LHS of R_dist_sym (R_dist _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment H : forall x y : R, R_dist x y = R_dist y x ε : R -> Prop n : nat Hn : (0 <= n)%nat M : R H0 : forall x : R, M < x -> ε x Unable to unify "Rabs 0 = 0" with "ε (INR n)".

original: unfold is_lim_seq. intros ε Hε. exists O. intros n Hn. rewrite R_dist_sym. apply Rabs_R0.
